column5: Well it was a great day on Long Point Bay. Tons of fish, but nothing huge. Sleded got a nice one just under 3 lbs. When he weighed in at 2:00pm he was at 5th place.. by 4:00 he had been beat out of the leaderboard. Too bad, but a nice fish nonetheless. We got a few pics, mostly video. Sleded's bass pic kinda sucks cuz it was taken with the video cam rather than the digital still cam.  Great opener, looking forward to many more days on the water this summer.
nice one. did you release the muskie?
Looks like a great day ont the water boys thanks for the pics of the bucket and the snotrocket.  WTG  MTP
nice day out there rich, looks like a snotrocket pike to me.
Good job boys. Is it just the black shirts or did you guys both drop a few pounds since last summer?
I'd rather catch small ones than catch nothing!Sounds like a good day to me!
I've dropped 50lbs since September. I dunno about Sleded though, what with his 90% battered rib diet.
LOL rich!! ya i have lost about 20 pounds maybee hopefully i can gain it back soon with all the ribssssssssssss im been eating lol!!
nice work-how many boats did you have to dodge? that LP opener can be a right zoo
Where did you guys launch? Mostly fish the inner bays?
